entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 2:30 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 inland. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
